features: Large Capacity & Freezer: More Room In Small Size! Even Convenient With Freezer! Galanz Mini Fridge Provides 3.1 Cu.Ft Large Capacity While Taking Up Minimal Space. With Freezer, It Is Perfect For All Your Favourite Drinks & Foods—From Fruits & Vegetables To Ice Creams & Quick-Frozen Foods.Freezer Capacity:0.95 cubic_feet.Fresh Food Capacity: 2.08 cubic_feet

Removable Glass Shelves & Interior Light: Removable Slide-Out Glass Shelves And Crisper Make It Easy To Customize The Interior And To Separate Different Types Of Food. Bright Led Light Illuminates The Interior, Bringing More Convenience For You

Energy-Saving & Low-Noise: Galanz Retro Refrigerator Uses R600A High-Efficiency And Low-Energy Consumption Compressor, Cooling Foods Quickly With Lower Energy. Below 42 Db Running Noise Makes It A Quiet Mini Fridge For Bedroom, Dorm, Office, Appartment, Etc

Adjustable Thermostat Control: Just Turn The Knob And You Can Easily Set The Temperature You Want! This Thoughtful Small Refrigerator Offers An Adjustable Thermostat Control With The Control Dial 0-7, The Larger Number The Cooler, For Different Needs
Storage double door design, freezer compartment can be used for storing frozen foods or making ice cubes | The door offers a spot for your favorite canned beverages

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Galanz 3.1 Cu.Ft dual door retro compact top freezer refrigerator has the look and feel of the fabulous old days, but has the appeal of a modern appliance, which can enrich your kitchen, rec room or home office with different styles, it can store snacks and keep cool beverages and more. This thoughtful refrigerator offers an adjustable thermostat separate freezer compartment, bright interior lighting, door shelves and vegetable crisper to make your life easily. Specification: Capacity: 3.1 Cu.Ft Color: Retro Blue Refrigerant: R600a Annual Energy Consumption: 320 kwh Voltage: 120Volts/ 60Hz Adjustable Thermostat LED Interior Light

Adjustable Thermostat Control Refrigerator compartment 32℉ to 47℉, freezer compartment<=0℉. Crystal Crisper Large capacity for you to keep food and vegetables fresh. Retro-style & Durable Handles Retro-style handles are easy to use. With 6 installed screws holding it in place, the durable handles will not loosen regardless of how often you open or close the refrigerator.

Perfect for office Retro refrigerator with its retro blue look, which will refresh your office. Perfect for kitchen Retro refrigerator can keep your food and drinks fresh and completely refrigerated in your kitchen. Perfect for dormitory Our refrigerator has a large capacity and takes up minimal space, making it the perfect fridge for any area.

Galanz 3.3 Cu.Ft. Refrigerator Galanz 3.1 Cu.Ft. Refrigerator Galanz 7.4 Cu.Ft. Refrigerator Galanz 10 Cu.Ft. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fridge and is a great conversation piece!
reviews.reviewText: So I waited a year to write this review because I really wanted to see how well it worked in my office. It is still going keeps everything cold. Perfect for my home office, keeps everything cold, I mainly use it for drinks, takeout lunch leftovers, and ice. Was used as extra refrigerator. space for Thanksgiving and Christmas not really deep enough for huge casserole dishes or something similar if you take out one or two of the racks a whole turkey could be placed in to thaw. Holds an entire case of soda if the veggie draw is used. It would BE PERFECT for a dorm, an attic bedroom, home office, or for an efficiency/studio apartment.It is decorative and something right out of the "I Love Lucy" show. It is a conversation piece and everyone smiles when they see it. I get a lot of "My Grandma had one almost exactly like that but bigger!"A great buy and we'll worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I love it. It’s exactly what I wanted. I wanted to get Red or White, I thought the color scheme would have looked better with my wall color, but those were 100$ more and I’m cheap, so no. I have it on the highest setting and it keeps everything perfectly cold to me. I only use it for beverages (which is why I removed the bottom draw) so I’m not sure how fresh produce will do but it’s definitely keeps it cold. Yes the handles are plastic, but it’s a Mini fridge. What would you expect? It still looks well made to me and not cheap looking by any means. My only issue was this vibrating metal sound it was making. It’s in my bedroom so that was VERY annoying the first few nights but there’s a little spiral coil I taped with electric tape and now silence! I’ll include a picture. So far so good. I expect it to last at least two years. If it doesn’t I will update.Update: Okay, so the highest setting isn’t the best, after a while my drinks started freezing. Even with a full fridge. It took a while but somewhere in between 4 and 5 is a sweet spot. Again, I only store drinks so If you’re storing produce you might want to go lower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love this mini fridge. It's all that was promised and more. The cold things stay cold and the freezer is freezing. Perfect.The color Bebop Blue is beautiful.We couldn't be more pleased~!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dorm
reviews.reviewText: We got this along with matching microwave. Both work well and look nice. They were packaged well and arrived without any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and has lots of space but makes noise every once in a while.
reviews.reviewText: First off this is a beautiful mini fridge and quite roomy inside. The temperature control can be a little tricky to figure out but I found its best to keep it on the default setting of 4. The freezer works surprisingly well. I have it in my dorm room so it can get annoying when it starts making noise at night but it is dead silent most of the time. For this reason I have to knock off a star. Overall, it is definitely worth it and if your not sleeping with it next to your bed it should have no faults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little fridge
reviews.reviewText: We opted for the turquoise fridge. Couldn't be happier with this purchase. It really keeps ice packs cold- we bought this for a second floor to keep ice packs and water in. It was a bit of a challenge getting it up the stairs upright (you cannot tilt refrigerators) but we did manage it. I wish they had wheels on the bottom since we had to push it on thick carpet and it would have made getting it up 14 stairs much easier than lifting one step at at time. The door hangs at bit at the bottom but it does close thoroughly and makes a good seal despite nearly sitting on top of the carpet. As you can see from the pics it has a lot of room for storage. This is QUIET you cannot hear it from five feet away at all and it came up to temp in less than one hour and a bottle of water I put in the freezer as a test was frozen solid in about three hours. Well made, adorable and affordable, very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive refrigerator with a nice freezer compartment. Looks expensive and very retro. It's actually a showpiece in my small apartment. Could be a centerpiece for the right genre. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just beautiful and surprisingly spacious!
reviews.reviewText: Never thought I’d describe an appliance as stunning but this little fridge really is a little work of art and takes pride of place in my retro kitchen. I was amazed at how spacious it is too. It’s really a lot more than just a mini fridge and even the freezer alone will hold enough meat for at least a few meals.On the downside, when it arrived, there was a huge dent in one of the corners of the box and sure enough, on opening it, there was a crack on the front top corner. Aagghh it had to be the front didn’t it! So I immediately called amazon and was told that, because this is considered a hazardous item, it cannot be returned so I could either keep the fridge with a total refund or keep the fridge and have another one sent out. I was so sad to see such a beautiful thing tarnished that I asked for a second one to be sent but then reconsidered and asked for a full refund instead. No one else has really noticed it without me pointing it out and I’m getting the matching microwave now as well. I’m happy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Freezer doesn't work after 2 mos use!!
reviews.reviewText: Had this in garage for poolside drinks and freezer quit working after 2 mos! Spent big bucks and it’s crapped out already!!
